response.overview: Mick Haller is a charismatic defense attorney who does business out of his Lincoln Continental sedan. Mick spends most of his time defending petty crooks and other bottom-feeders, so it comes as quite a surprise when he lands the case of a lifetime: defending a Beverly Hills playboy who is accused of attempted murder. However, what Mick initially thinks is an open-and-shut case with a big monetary reward develops into something more sinister.
response.tagline: This case is a dangerous game of life and death.
response.title: The Lincoln Lawyer

results.name: The Lincoln Lawyer (2011) Trailer #2 | Movieclips Classic Trailers
